channel.title: General Section
channel.description: I like to talk about different stuff and i am pretty sure your do to sick of getting muted because u felt like talking about something els about rsc then development and criticizing on other peoples servers. VOTE VOTE VOTE maybe it will come true lol.

it’s own board would have been cooler, could you remove the internal development board (as it never gets used) and put up a RSC General discussion? we would greatly appreciate it

item.title: General Section
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

lolitrollu:

I vote yes. Also, don’t call me a newfag because this is my first post, because I’m not a newfag. I am the legendary bigh51. Look at my previous typing style vs my current typing style if you don’t believe me, it’s identical. If you don’t believe me, I don’t really care. There’s no reason not to have a general RSC section, David and Cocoa are honestly just being idiots, or they’re failing really badly at trolling. This is my 16th account btw, in case anyone was wondering how many accounts I’ve had banned.

Lol, 16 accounts now? Give it a rest, being a former mod doesn’t really make you any more elite than the level of failure around here.

Read full topic

item.title: General Section
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“bamboozola, post:103, topic:346008”]david should just shut the fuck up. topic will be closed on july 1st so i don’t think the general section will happen.

And the mods wonder why they are always locking topic just fucking make a general section and we all will be happy.[/quote]Wonderful logic. Let’s just make a new section for everyone that wants one so that everyone can be happy!

[quote=“Rixxx, post:104, topic:346008”]Davidi2, just out of curiosity, why the fuck do you care? You are making yourself more of an idiot than you already have been earlier in this thread. I’m not siding with the other posters; it just makes me wonder why you even care. This is the point: they want a board for RSC general discussion. So why must you interfere when most probably you’ll not even contribute anything to RSC?

kthxbai

Edit: Just look at how you are going crazy in this thread. If they have the board, would you post? No.[/quote]I’ve actually been pretty calm. If you want to know why I care, it’s the principal. I honestly don’t care what type of board they would be asking for, but why should they get it if there already is a topic for general discussion? Renaming this board to something more appropriate would be great.

Read full topic
